bill_title: appropriate money for the South Dakota Agriculture and Rural Leadership program.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money for the South Dakota Agriculture and Rural Leadership program. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the employer's investment in South Dakota's future fund established in § 61-5-24.2 the sum of thirty-five thousand dollars ($35,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of Agriculture for a grant to the South Dakota Agriculture and Rural Leadership program. Section 2. The secretary of the Department of Agriculture shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2000, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
